questions.question: Taking place on an island on the back of an elephant, this arc delves into the history of the Mink Tribe and the Kozuki Family. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates participating in a gladiator-style tournament on an island ruled by a Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This arc features Luffy's desperate battle at Marineford to save his brother Ace, leading to a war between the Marines and Whitebeard's pirates. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Big Mom Pirates, allows the user to create and manipulate candy. What is...?
This princess of the Alabasta Kingdom travels with the Straw Hat Pirates and wields the power of the Flower-Flower Fruit. Who is...?
This new character, a skilled samurai and one of the Nine Red Scabbards, is known for their mastery of the Nitoryu style. Who is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
